feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX2][Hosted Private Cloud] - Multiple hosts migration notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 1, 20:00 UTC  -  Apr 2, 05:00 UTC

Jan 13, 21:30 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer, affecting hosts in racks 31A12, 31A13, 31A14 and 31A15.

Start time : 01/04/2026 20:00 UTC
End time : 02/04/2026 05:00 UTC
Service impact : Hosts located in the specified racks will be temporarily unavailable during the maintenance for 8 hours maximum.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will migrate Hosted Private Cloud hosts in the specified racks from RBX2 datacenter to RBX7 datacenter.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Managed vSphere] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 2, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 5, 17:00 UTC

Jan 28, 20:26 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 02/03/2026 08:00 UTC
End time : 05/03/2026 17:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere will not be accessible and the hosts will be put into maintenance mode during the operation.
If the host has virtual machines in it, a vMotion will be performed.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Managed vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

entry.title: [SBG1A][Managed vSphere] - Storage maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 26, 07:30 - 22:00 UTC

Jan 29, 14:04 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer in SBG1A region.

Start time : 26/02/2026 07:30 UTC
End time : 26/02/2026 22:00 UTC
Service impact : There will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability, or virtual machines during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU][Public VMware Cloud Foundation] - Delivery incident notification
entry.content:
Jan 29, 15:07 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Public VMware Cloud Foundation delivery offer has now been resolved.

Start time : 26/01/2026 11:50 UTC
End time : 29/01/2026 14:50 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 29, 14:03 UTC
Identified - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Public VMware Cloud Foundation delivery offering.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 26/01/2026 11:50 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : New Public VMware Cloud Foundation delivery was temporarily unavailable till 28/01/2026 16:00 UTC.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to order new Public VMware Cloud Foundation.
Customers are now able to order new Public VMware Cloud Foundation.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are currently working on the orders made by customers between 26/01/2026 11:50 UTC and 28/01/2026 16:00 UTC.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [EU][Public VMware Cloud Foundation] - Delivery incident notification
entry.content:
Jan 29, 10:46 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Public VMware Cloud Foundation delivery offer has been resolved.

Start time : 26/01/2026 11:50 UTC
End time : 28/01/2026 09:00 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 28, 11:00 UTC
Update - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Public VMware Cloud Foundation delivery offering.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 26/01/2026 11:50 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : New Public VMware Cloud Foundation delivery is temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to order new Public VMware Cloud Foundation.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 28, 08:42 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Public VMware Cloud Foundation delivery offer.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
